description: A comprehensive guide to the questions of the grave.

sections.arabic: اعْلَمْ - رَحِمَكَ اللهُ - أَنَّهُ يَجِبُ عَلَيْنَا تَعَلَّمُ أَرْبَعِ مَسَائِلَ: الأُولَى العِلْمُ، وهُوَ مَعْرِفَةُ اللهِ، وَمَعْرِفَةُ نَبِيِّهِ، وَمَعْرِفَةُ دِينِ الإِسْلامِ بِالأَدِلَّةِ
sections.english: Know, may Allah have mercy upon you, that it is obligatory upon us to learn four matters. The First: Knowledge, which is knowledge of Allah, knowledge of His Prophet, and knowledge of the religion of Islam with evidences.

sections.arabic: الثَّانِيَةُ: العَمَلُ بِهِ. الثَّالِثَةُ: الدَّعْوَةُ إِلَيْهِ. الرَّابِعَةُ: الصَّبْرُ عَلَى الْأَذَى فِيهِ
sections.english: The Second: Acting upon it. The Third: Calling to it. The Fourth: Patience with the harm that comes with it.
takeaways: Patience is essential for the caller

sections.arabic: اعْلَمْ - رَحِمَكَ اللهُ - أَنَّهُ يَجِبُ عَلَى كُلِّ مُسْلِمٍ وَمُسْلِمَةٍ تَعَلَّمُ ثَلَاثِ هَذِهِ المَسَائِلِ وَالْعَمَلُ بِهِنَّ : الأُولَى : أَنَّ اللَّهَ خَلَقَنَا وَرَزَقَنَا وَلَمْ يَتْرُكْنَا هَمَلاً
sections.english: Know, may Allah have mercy upon you, that it is obligatory on every Muslim, male and female, to learn these three matters and act upon them. The First: That Allah created us, sustained us, and did not leave us neglected.
takeaways: Allah is the Creator and Sustainer

sections.arabic: فَإِذَا قِيلَ لَكَ : مَنْ رَبُّكَ؟ فَقُلْ: رَبِّيَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي رَبَّانِي وَرَبَّي جَمِيعَ الْعَالَمِينَ بِنِعَمِهِ، وَهُوَ مَعْبُودِي لِيْسَ لِي مَعْبُودٌ سِوَاهُ
sections.english: So if it is said to you: 'Who is your Lord?', say: 'My Lord is Allah, who has nurtured me and all of the worlds with His favors. He is my object of worship; I have no other object of worship but Him.'

sections.arabic: الأَصْلُ الثَّانِي: مَعْرِفَةُ دِينِ الإِسْلامِ بِالْأَدِلَّةِ، وَهُوَ الاسْتِسْلَامُ لِلَّهِ بِالتَّوْحِيدِ وَالانْقِيَادُ لَهُ بِالطَّاعَةِ وَالْبَرَاءَةُ مِنَ الشِّرْكِ وَأَهْلِهِ
sections.english: The Second Fundamental Principle: Knowledge of the religion of Islam with evidences. It is submission to Allah with Tawheed, compliance to Him with obedience, and dissociation from Shirk and its people.

sections.arabic: الأَصْلُ الثَّالِثُ : مَعْرِفَةُ نَبِيِّكُمْ مُحَمَّدٍ وَهَوَ مُحَمَّدُ بنُ عَبْدِ اللهِ بْنِ عَبْدِ الْمُطَّلِبِ بْنِ هَاشِمٍ، وَهَاشِمٌ مِنْ قُرَيْشٍ
sections.english: The Third Fundamental Principle: Knowledge of your Prophet Muhammad. He is Muhammad bin Abdullah bin Abdul-Muttalib bin Hashim, and Hashim is from Quraysh.
